meanings.definition: Moisture exuded through the pores of the skin, typically as a reaction to heat, physical exertion, or anxiety.
meanings.sent1: After running, his sweats were visible on his forehead.
meanings.sent2: She wiped the sweats off her face after the intense workout.
meanings.sent3: The nervous speaker could feel the sweats forming on his palms.
meanings.sent4: The tension in the room was so thick you could almost see the sweats in the air.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's sweats glistened under the hot sun, showing his hard work.

meanings.definition: A pair of loose-fitting pants with an elastic waistband, typically worn for exercise or lounging.
meanings.sent1: She put on her favorite sweats before heading to the gym.
meanings.sent2: He lounged on the couch in his comfy sweats all day.
meanings.sent3: The cat snuggled up on the pile of sweats left on the bed.
meanings.sent4: Her sweats were so cozy, she never wanted to take them off.
meanings.sent5: The old sweats had seen many workouts and lazy Sundays.

meanings.definition: To exude moisture through the pores of the skin.
meanings.sent1: The hiker sweats profusely during the steep climb.
meanings.sent2: After the run, she could feel herself starting to sweat.
meanings.sent3: The nervous student sweats before every exam, no matter how prepared he is.
meanings.sent4: The heat of the day made him sweat like never before.
meanings.sent5: The intense workout session caused her to sweat buckets.

meanings.definition: To work hard or labor intensely.
meanings.sent1: He sweats all day in the sun to earn a living.
meanings.sent2: The chef sweats over the stove to prepare the perfect dish.
meanings.sent3: The team sweats through the night to finish the project on time.
meanings.sent4: She sweats through each practice to improve her skills.
meanings.sent5: The artist sweats over every detail to create a masterpiece.
